text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: The kingdom of swords and spells,<n>Umanest.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
In this world, the title of fleetest goes<n>not to the dire wolves,
nor to the<n>wyverns.

text_block_list.name: Orc
text_block_list.text:
Bugro, bugrbrgrbgrrr, bugogogo?!<n>(Bullcrap! How can they
be catching<n>up with us?!)

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Yaaaa! Stop it right there, you thievin'<n>orc!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: We've caught up with it, El. It's time<n>to attack!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: You betcha, Grass! Hiyaaaah!<n>CONDOR FISTS OF FURYYY!
A few hours earlier...

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Here they are! The VR Umalators!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
VR... Umalators? Is that what these<n>three things are,
Director? They look<n>like metal caskets.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Allow me to explain. The VR Umalator<n>is a racing simulator
developed for the<n>use of Tracen Academy students.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Turf or dirt, firm or wet—the virtual<n>track can emulate all
kinds of<n>racecourse conditions.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hmm... A customizable track certainly<n>would be convenient.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Nyahaha, a simulator though, huh? So<n>much for being my
personal napping<n>pod.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
But wait! There's more—a feature that<n>lets you play
affiliated online games in<n>VR, using your own physical stats!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
With this add-on, we can send our<n>beloved Umamusume to
magical<n>kingdoms, sci-fi galaxies, cyberpunk<n>cities...
Anywhere you can dream of!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
D-Director... You know how much I<n>voiced my concerns
over that<n>function...

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Yet, you decided to install it<n>regardless of the trouble it might<n>
cause.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Of course! My aim is to further<n>expand the greatness of my<n>
Umamusume! Even if I have to spend<n>all my pocket money
in the process!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Oooh, so you can run and playgames, then? These machines can doeverything!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Oh? It looks like someone's already<n>trying one. Might I ask
who?

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
President Symboli Rudolf is giving it a<n>test run on behalf of
the academy. We<n>can't have our students utilizing<n>faulty
equipment.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: That's our trusty president! Hey,<n>Director. I also wanna—

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Huh? Is that a warning signal?

text_block_list.name: Machine Voice
text_block_list.text:
Emergency, emergency. An anomaly<n>has been detected in
device 01.

text_block_list.name: Machine Voice
text_block_list.text:
Connecting devices 02 and 03 to the<n>session may enable
remote repairs. If<n>the issue persists, please perform a<n>
factory reset.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: A factory reset?! We can't!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
We'd have to reconfigure everything<n>from scratch... What
could be<n>happening in device 01?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf?
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... Huff, huff...

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: It seems like the president is running<n>like normal though...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ohhh, it sounds like the virtual world<n>needs saving! Backup!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I know! Since everyone here'stwiddlin' their thumbs, let me getin and fix it!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I'm the sturdiest! Stubbornest! The<n>absolute strongeeest! A
little tech<n>trouble doesn't scare me!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: In that case, I'm going too.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
If there's a problem with the<n>machine, you might not be able
to<n>handle it by yourself. I'll help you out,<n>if need be.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Heh, a fabulous duo! Seeing as<n>you're close friends, I'm
sure you'll<n>do a fine job!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Try not to get yourselves hurt. Now,<n>off you go!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Umm... I guess this is the start button.<n>One push, and we
should enter<n>runnin' mode...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Wait, this isn't running mode?<n>What happened to
connecting to the<n>same session?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Huhhh?! Where are we, Grass?<n>What's this place? And
what am I<n>wearin'?!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
It... looks like we're in some kind of<n>fantasy game world.
Did a different<n>mode get activated?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Fantasy... Then this get-up... I must be<n>some kind of monk
brawler.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: And it looks like I'm a cleric. Hmm...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I can even see my stats. I suppose<n>that confirms the
fantasy game theory.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
But why? We were meant to enter<n>running mode and link
with device 01...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
It's gotta be for a reason! Maybe we<n>need to fix whatever
problem's<n>unfoldin' in this world first!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
El, forgive me if I'm wrong, but I'm<n>getting the impression
you just want<n>to go exploring.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Though you have a point. If the device<n>brought us here, the
root of the error<n>might be close by.
Chatter, chatter...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Oh, there's a crowd of people!<n>Maybe they're fellow
players?

text_block_list.name: Adventurer A
text_block_list.text:
Whoa! What are you two playing as?!<n>Those ears look
pretty long... Are you<n>elves? Or maybe werewolves,<n>
judging by the tails?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Nope! We're Umamusume!

text_block_list.name: Adventurer B
text_block_list.text: Whaaa?! Umamusume... You mean,like real Umamusume? In a gamelike this? This is gonna be wild!

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
Ohhhhh, Umamusume! The legend<n>was true! Perhaps this is
our salvation<n>sent from above.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: The... legend? Could you explain?

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
It has long been foretold—grave peril<n>will befall the land of
Umanest. And<n>then...

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
"Fantasy incarnate shall look down<n>upon this world from the
heavens.<n>With innate, thunderous power, she<n>will deliver
unto the demon lord a<n>strike of destruction and felicity alike."

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
"Fantasy incarnate"... I suppose that<n>could refer to us
real-world<n>Umamusume, though I'm more<n>concerned by
the last bit.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
The demon lord?! You're sayin'<n>there's a big bad demon
runnin'<n>around?

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. The demon lord appeared in<n>this world but a few
days prior and<n>has since defeated many of our<n>brave
heroes. How lost we are in the<n>face of this veritable crisis.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Estupendo! Did you hear that, Grass?<n>There's no way we
were sent here<n>by accident!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
This demon lord's gotta be the<n>source of our trouble!
Ordinary folk<n>might not be able to stop 'em, but we<n>
Umamusume can! That's why we<n>were summoned here!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
So, you think the demon lord is what<n>triggered the bug?
And... considering<n>the game's legend, we Umamusume<n>
hold the key to defeating it?
